text:
This home screen lists the Audio Dharma albums. Talks are contained within these albums.

For each album, the number at the top right is the count of talks contained in that album. The number below it is the total duration of these talks.

Select an album to get the list of talks within it.

The Personal Album section contain talks that you recently noted, favorited, shared, downloaded or played, and the Custom Album secton allows you to create your own albums.

The Community Activity section shows talks that other people in the community have recently shared or played.
